name: Velocity Departure Mismatch Factor (M_Vbf)
functionStatement: Bankfull velocity reflects stable, near-threshold transport without chronic instability.
descriptionMarkdown: Mismatch factor: M = max(Vbf/Vref, Vref/Vbf). Lower is better.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Estimate Vbf from Manning/HEC-RAS or ADCP; set Vref from reference reach/stream type; compute mismatch.

inputs.label: Velocity Departure Mismatch Factor (M_Vbf)
inputs.helpMarkdown: Modeled or measured bankfull velocity + expected/reference velocity.

sourceMetadata.metricDataSource: Modeled or measured bankfull velocity + expected/reference velocity.
sourceMetadata.metricStatement: Bankfull velocity reflects stable, near-threshold transport without chronic instability.
sourceMetadata.description: Mismatch factor: M = max(Vbf/Vref, Vref/Vbf). Lower is better.
sourceMetadata.howToMeasure: Estimate Vbf from Manning/HEC-RAS or ADCP; set Vref from reference reach/stream type; compute mismatch.
referencesRaw: SFARI rapid assessment; hydraulic modeling guidance.

stratifications.name: Proposed (derived from SFARI rapid curves) - Use stream-type specific Vref; compute by representative cross-sections.
stratifications.stratification: Use stream-type specific Vref; compute by representative cross-sections.
